Classes in com.mvp4g.client.event used by com.mvp4g.client
EventBus
          Interface that defines an event bus.
 

Classes in com.mvp4g.client.event used by com.mvp4g.client.annotation
EventBus
          Interface that defines an event bus.
 

Classes in com.mvp4g.client.event used by com.mvp4g.client.event
BaseEventBus
          Base implementation of the event bus.
EventBus
          Interface that defines an event bus.
EventBusWithLookup
          Event bus where events can be fired thanks to their name.
EventFilter
          This interface can be implemented in order to receive events all events from an EventBus.

Classes that implement this interface are associated with an EventBus class by adding the
filter class literal to the filterClasses list in the EventBus' @Events annotation
EventHandlerInterface
          Interface that defines an event handler.

This interface provides getter and setter for the event bus.

It is recommended to use directly BaseEventHandler.
Mvp4gLogger
          Interface that defines a logger used for events logging.
 

Classes in com.mvp4g.client.event used by com.mvp4g.client.history
EventBus
          Interface that defines an event bus.
 

Classes in com.mvp4g.client.event used by com.mvp4g.client.presenter
BaseEventHandler
          Default implementation of EventHandlerInterface.

This implementation has an event bus attribute.
You should extend this class to create a presenter.
EventBus
          Interface that defines an event bus.
EventHandlerInterface
          Interface that defines an event handler.

This interface provides getter and setter for the event bus.

It is recommended to use directly BaseEventHandler.
